last_episode_to_air.name: Into the Light
last_episode_to_air.overview: With a rival threatening to divulge her secret for money, Penelope chooses the best path forward as her relationships and livelihood hang in the balance.

name: Bridgerton
overview: Wealth, lust, and betrayal set in the backdrop of Regency era England, seen through the eyes of the powerful Bridgerton family.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: The eight close-knit siblings of the Bridgerton family look for love and happiness in London high society.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Duty, desire and scandal collide when Viscount Anthony Bridgerton decides to marry, only to meet his match in his intended bride's headstrong big sister.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: As a new crop of debutantes yearns to become the brightest of the ball, a wallflower with a double life finds her light amid secrets and surprises.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Despite his elder and younger brothers both being happily married, Benedict is loath to settle down — until he meets a captivating Lady in Silver at his mother’s masquerade ball.

episodes.name: Diamond of the First Water
episodes.overview: Daphne debuts on London's marriage market as a new gossip sheet sets high society atwitter and Simon, the eligible Duke of Hastings, returns to town.

episodes.name: Shock and Delight
episodes.overview: Simon's apparent courtship of Daphne angers her brother Anthony and threatens to ruin the arrangements he made. Marina opens up to a curious Penelope.

episodes.name: Art of the Swoon
episodes.overview: After Daphne catches the eye of a royal suitor, she turns to Simon for relationship advice. Lady Featherington tries to browbeat Marina into marriage.

episodes.name: An Affair of Honor
episodes.overview: Daphne receives a stunning gift from Prince Friedrich but soon courts scandal at a ball. Eloise searches for clues to Lady Whistledown's identity.

episodes.name: The Duke and I
episodes.overview: To fend off rumors about their garden escapade, Simon and Daphne must make a personal appeal to the queen. Marina's wedlock scheme dismays Penelope.

episodes.name: Swish
episodes.overview: On her honeymoon, Daphne discovers just how uninformed she is about the physical aspects of the marital bed. Colin comes to a decision about Marina.

episodes.name: Oceans Apart
episodes.overview: Amid accusations of lies and betrayal, a rift forms between the newlyweds, while a deception of another kind could besmirch the Bridgerton family name.

guest_stars.character: High Society Married Lady of the Ton
guest_stars.name: Sarah Guerin

episodes.name: After the Rain
episodes.overview: The duke and duchess's season-ending ball signals a turning point for their marriage — and ushers in changes of fortune and fate to those around them.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: The eight close-knit siblings of the Bridgerton family look for love and happiness in London high society.

episodes.name: Capital R Rake
episodes.overview: Anthony begins his search for a wife, Eloise braves her society debut, and Lady Danbury helps the queen choose a diamond among the season's debutantes.

episodes.name: Off to the Races
episodes.overview: Facing heated competition and a prickly foe, Anthony steps up his courtship game. Eloise makes a Lady Whistledown discovery as a family member returns.

episodes.name: A Bee in Your Bonnet
episodes.overview: The Sharmas arrive at the Bridgerton's country estate, where Anthony seeks to win Kate's good opinion amid bad memories and a ruthless game of pall-mall.

episodes.name: Victory
episodes.overview: As guests gather for the Bridgerton's ball, Anthony and Kate clash during a hunting party, Colin revisits the past, and Lady Featherington sets a trap.

episodes.name: An Unthinkable Fate
episodes.overview: Rattled by Anthony's hasty nuptial plans, Kate receives advice from Lady Danbury. Eloise spars with a new ally. Emotions run high during a dinner party.

episodes.name: The Choice
episodes.overview: Anthony's duty to his family wars with his desire for Kate. Edwina ponders her future — and impresses the queen. Eloise's rendezvous stirs suspicion.

episodes.name: Harmony
episodes.overview: Scandalous rumors swirl around the Bridgertons and the Sharmas. The queen’s ire over Lady Whistledown lands Eloise and Penelope in a quandary.

episodes.name: The Viscount Who Loved Me
episodes.overview: Anthony lashes out as he awaits news of Kate, while Eloise turns to Theo for help in her Lady Whistledown hunt and Lady Featherington plans a grand ball.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Duty, desire and scandal collide when Viscount Anthony Bridgerton decides to marry, only to meet his match in his intended bride's headstrong big sister.

episodes.name: Out of the Shadows
episodes.overview: The debutantes enter the marriage mart as Francesca navigates her first season out. A well-traveled bachelor returns, and Penelope unveils a new look.

episodes.name: How Bright the Moon
episodes.overview: Penelope begins her private lessons in charming suitors, but the arrangement quickly grows complicated. A dazzling debutante seizes the queen's attention.

episodes.name: Forces of Nature
episodes.overview: Penelope catches the eye of nature-loving Lord Debling, to the dismay of other admirers. A near-catastrophe on a windy day makes a hero out of Colin.

episodes.name: Old Friends
episodes.overview: When a caller arrives at her home, Penelope faces a difficult choice. For others, opportunities to build a fresh start — and find a love match — abound.

episodes.name: Tick Tock
episodes.overview: Lady Whistledown's surprising engagement announcement reverberates through the Ton, while Penelope grapples with the need to disclose her true identity.

episodes.name: Romancing Mister Bridgerton
episodes.overview: A desperate impostor strives to publicly win the queen's favor. Penelope races to write an urgent missive — but has the damage already been done?

episodes.name: Joining of Hands
episodes.overview: A shocking column fuels the queen's search for the real Lady Whistledown. As the wedding looms, Penelope questions her future as a wife — and scribe.

episodes.name: Into the Light
episodes.overview: With a rival threatening to divulge her secret for money, Penelope chooses the best path forward as her relationships and livelihood hang in the balance.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: As a new crop of debutantes yearns to become the brightest of the ball, a wallflower with a double life finds her light amid secrets and surprises.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Despite his elder and younger brothers both being happily married, Benedict is loath to settle down — until he meets a captivating Lady in Silver at his mother’s masquerade ball.
